title: Free week champs in ranked
body: So since start the new season i have realized, that you can select and play as champs you don't own in ranked. I was helping friend out with playing ranked and the didn't know free week champs were meant to be banned so they selected kennen whom they dont own, and played ranked with him.

replies.body: You can play free to play champions in ranked as of the latest patch.
F2p Champs can't be used in Ranked unless you own them. It's what's stopping me from ranking on one of my smurfs.
